snippet.title: Mononoke Slashdown (STEAM)
snippet.description:
Save the city from rampant ghosts, and give it back to its people! An exciting new ninja action game! “Mononoke Slashdown”!

●STEAM "Mononoke Slashdown" store page:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1672630/

●Game introduction
Control Kagemaru the ninja, using ninjutsu arts, kunai daggers and the katana to defeat ghosts and monsters in this 2D scrolling action game!
Kill the ghosts to collect in-game currency and use it to buy powerful weapons, armor, ninjutsu techniques to power-up, and return the city back to its people!
What is more, every stage has secret challenges to complete.
Can you take up the challenge to try and complete all the missions?

◆Development Company: F K Digital
F K Digital was founded in Australia, and is now based in Taiwan, where it develops games.
The flagship arcade fighting game, “Chaos Code”, has been well received by fighting game enthusiasts.
It has also ported many games to PlayStation and Nintendo home consoles.
http://www.fkdigital.net/
